definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: Minimum and secondary spacings are to be determined by the fabricator.
sentences.chinese: 最小间距和第二选择间距由制造商确定。

sentences.english: US armsmakers and high-tech industries are salivating at the thought of enteringIndia's market.
sentences.chinese: 美国军火制造商和高科技产业都在垂涎印度的市场。

sentences.english: On Wednesday, the tobacconists went to on strike against the a new anti-smoking law.
sentences.chinese: 星期三，烟草制造商继续抗议政府的新反吸烟法。

sentences.english: TV manufacturers have enjoyed a ten-percent rise in sales over the past year.
sentences.chinese: 去年电视制造商们已经把电视销售额提高了10%。

sentences.english: Some of the first deals included an electric-equipment manufacturer and a textile exporter.
sentences.chinese: 首批协议中的一部分是用电设备制造商和纺织出口商。

sentences.english: Rivals complained about its heavy-handed tactics. pc makers griped that it was hogging the industry's profits.
sentences.chinese: 个人电脑制造商抱怨它扭曲了整个行业的利益。

sentences.english: The makers of navigation devices have not ignored the spread of smartphones.
sentences.chinese: 导航设备制造商们并没有忽略向智能手机的延伸。

sentences.english: Italian manufacturer of hiking and mountaineering footwear.
sentences.chinese: 意大利制造商的徒步旅行和登山鞋。

sentences.english: The motherboard manufacturer then customizes this BIOS to suit its own hardware.
sentences.chinese: 主板制造商则此BIOS定制适合自己的硬件。

sentences.english: But they said this would be up to those device makers.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们表示，这将取决于那些设备制造商。

sentences.english: Sun, the Lehman Brothers economist, says as manufacturers are pushed to the brink, China's stock markets could see sharp declines.
sentences.chinese: 孙明春表示，制造商被推倒悬崖边缘，中国股市大跌。

sentences.english: This is usually indicated by a tag near the MSRP tag set by the manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 这通常是由一个标签显示附近标签由制造商更新。

sentences.english: The manufacturer had an existing table with the depot polygons already defined.
sentences.chinese: 制造商有一个已经定义了维修站多边形的现成的表。

sentences.english: Most of the food manufacturers still add MSG into their food.
sentences.chinese: 大多数食品制造商仍在食品中添加味精。

sentences.english: Denmark is home to the world's largest wind turbine manufacturer, Vestas.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦是世界最大风力涡轮机制造商维斯塔斯的家乡。

sentences.english: This company is the chemical process chlorine dioxide generator specialized manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是化学法二氧化氯发生器专业制造商。

definition: (bus, train etc) depot/car factory or repair shop
